001package net.tvburger.jdl.linalg;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004
005public final class Vectors {
006
007    private Vectors() {
008    }
009
010    @SafeVarargs
011    public static <N extends Number> TypedVector<N> of(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, N... values) {
012        N[] numbers = typeSupport.createArray(values.length);
013        for (int i = 0; i < numbers.length; i++) {
014            numbers[i] = values[i];
015        }
016        return new TypedVector<>(numbers, false, typeSupport);
017    }
018
019    public static TypedVector<Float> of(float... values) {
020        Float[] floats = new Float[values.length];
021        for (int i = 0; i < floats.length; i++) {
022            floats[i] = values[i];
023        }
024        return new TypedVector<>(floats, false, JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT);
025    }
026
027    public static TypedVector<Double> of(double... values) {
028        Double[] doubles = new Double[values.length];
029        for (int i = 0; i < doubles.length; i++) {
030            doubles[i] = values[i];
031        }
032        return new TypedVector<>(doubles, false, JavaNumberTypeSupport.DOUBLE);
033    }
034
035    public static <N extends Number, M extends Number> TypedVector<M> convert(Vector<N> vector, JavaNumberTypeSupport<M> typeSupport) {
036        M[] numbers = typeSupport.createArray(vector.getDimensions());
037        for (int i = 0; i < vector.getDimensions(); i++) {
038            numbers[i] = typeSupport.valueOf(vector.get(i + 1).doubleValue());
039        }
040        return new TypedVector<>(numbers, vector.isColumnVector(), typeSupport);
041    }
042
043    public static TypedVector<Double> withDoublePrecision(TypedVector<Float> vector) {
044        Double[] doubles = JavaNumberTypeSupport.DOUBLE.createArray(vector.getDimensions());
045        for (int i = 0; i < vector.getDimensions(); i++) {
046            doubles[i] = (double) (float) vector.get(i + 1);
047        }
048        return new TypedVector<>(doubles, vector.isColumnVector(), JavaNumberTypeSupport.DOUBLE);
049    }
050
051    public static TypedVector<Float> withSinglePrecision(TypedVector<Double> vector) {
052        Float[] floats = JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT.createArray(vector.getDimensions());
053        for (int i = 0; i < vector.getDimensions(); i++) {
054            floats[i] = (float) (double) vector.get(i + 1);
055        }
056        return new TypedVector<>(floats, vector.isColumnVector(), JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT);
057    }
058}
